description: This Dart source file defines the EventStore class, which manages a collection of calendar events with CRUD operations, date selection, and demo data seeding. It includes methods for retrieving events for specific dates, counting events per day, and notifying listeners of state changes.

classes.name: EventStore
classes.description: A class that manages calendar events in memory, providing CRUD operations, date selection, and demo event seeding. It extends ChangeNotifier for state management in Flutter.

methods.name: selectDate
methods.description: Updates the selected date and notifies listeners.

methods.name: addEvent
methods.description: Adds a new event to the store and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateEvent
methods.description: Updates an existing event by ID and notifies listeners.

methods.name: deleteEvent
methods.description: Removes an event by ID and notifies listeners.

methods.name: seedDemoEvents
methods.description: Creates sample events with randomized data for demonstration purposes.
